alert.note: Alert for Carter; Powder River (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 25 at 4:23PM MDT until May 25 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Billings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Carter County in southeastern Montana... East central Powder River County in southeastern Montana... * Until 500 PM MDT. * At 421 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 21 miles southwest of Ridgeway, or 30 miles southeast of Broadus, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail and torrential rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Hammond. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
